comment.author: 99769016@N00
comment._content: Aurelia Phelan secretly marries Rawson Kipp Underhill on Saturday, 10 May 1913 query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9A07E...

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: There's a NYTimes mention of Dorothy Lazarus, daughter of Mrs. Florine Lazarus and the late Edward Lazarus, engaged to Jean Cauchois (1893-1962), son of Mr and Mrs Frederic Augustus Cauchois, both families of the Upper West Side, in 1916.  They married the following year.  They had three children that I can discover:  Barbara (1920), Jean Jr. (1921-1994), and Mignon (1923).

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Headline should read Lazarus, not Lasarus.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks Wystan.  We'll correct the spelling in the title the next time we update this record.
